overview:
Valentin Squirelo is co-founder of Tactilize.com

He holds his expertise from his numerous professional experiences, and has been working in the web sector since 2002.

A digital strategy consultant in the music industry, he put his expertise to the use of Owni’s media service. He develops OWNI music and stands out for his skills as a business developer.

Valentin combines a business vision and solid technical skills. As the critical motor of the Tactilize company he assures the daily conception of the product as well as the unity of the team.
